greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Generated by reverse of Schroeder II o.g.f.
comment: The o.g.f. S(x) for A001003 (Schroeder II) satisfies 2*S^2(x) + (1+x)*S(x) + x = 0.

Using the Lagrange series for y=S(x) with y=0+x*(y/A(y)) leads to the formula for Schroeder II numbers involving the Narayana triangle A001263. See the Narayana comment by B. Cloitre under A001003 and a multiple differentiation formula given there.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1).
xref: If the initial 0 is omitted, we get A153881.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_ Nov 13 2007
